author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: From an independent standpoint it is all political gamesmanship, there was no “incursion” of territorial waters. However those sneaky commies do need an eye kept on them (to use last century phrasing).

author: Craig Northacker
content: Unfortunately, the problem with accepting foreign money, especially from Russia and China, is that we can have no confidence in those accepting that money who are now our “leaders”. That applies equally to both parties. We the people are hung out to dry.
